title: Marc Fosh's banana, orange and ginger smoothie recipe
description:
Marc Fosh's tip

My kids love this smoothie and my wife likes to add granola for a nutritious breakfast on the go.

This recipe was prepared using the Braun Multiquick 7 Cordless hand blender with the ice crusher, and large chopper accessory.

asset.title: Marc Fosh's banana, orange and ginger smoothie recipe

asset.author: Braun

transcripts:
[MUSIC PLAYING]

Hi, I'm Marc Fosh and today we're going to make an energizing smoothie with banana, orange juice and ginger. So the first thing we're going to do is make some crushed ice. So we'll add some nice cubes to here. Okay amazing, which we can now spoon into our glasses. Okay now we're ready to make our smoothie. So we need to first add our bananas. Some freshly grated ginger. Some nice thick natural yogurt. A spoon full of honey, clean honey. Some orange juice and some lime juice. Okay so now with the cordless, we'll just bring that to a nice puree. Okay, so with the cordless multi-quick. It takes us seconds to make a wonderful fresh energizing smoothie. Just pour it on the crushed ice. Okay and there we have it. Banana orange and ginger  smoothie.
